main event: A witness in Red Devil, Alaska observed a shiny metallic disc-shaped object moving at high speed across the sky on July 29, 1959.
interesting points: The object was moving at an estimated speed of 570 mph.
The object was estimated to be about 5 miles away from the witness.
The object was observed for about 5 minutes and it moved in and out of clouds.
The object did not make any sound and did not alter its course or speed during the sighting.
The object appeared to be reflecting sunlight and leaving a reddish colored exhaust vapor trail.
